attributes.action: Make it mandatory that schools/colleges/universities have gender neutral toilets
attributes.additional_details: There are about 600,000 trans and non binary people in the uk, that number will increase over the years, and more and more people will feel uncomfortable going to gender assigned toilets. Releasing bodily fluids is a human right, and no one should be uncomfortable doing so.
attributes.background: It's hard for transgender men/woman, non – binary and gender fluid people and much more, to go in a toilet assigned to a gender that they don't want to be seen as. As a trans boy, I find it hard to go in the girls toilet in school, it makes me feel uncomfortable. And I'm sure I'm not alone.
